Class CsrFieldMatrix<T extends Field<T>>

All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, CsrMatrixMixin<CsrFieldMatrix<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,CooFieldVector<T>,FieldVector<T>,Field<T>[],T>, MatrixMixinOld<CsrFieldMatrix<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,CooFieldVector<T>,FieldVector<T>,Field<T>[],T>, MatrixVectorOpsMixin<CsrFieldMatrix<T>,CooFieldVector<T>,FieldVector<T>>, TensorBinaryOpsMixin<CsrFieldMatrix<T>,CsrFieldMatrix<T>>, TensorMixin<CsrFieldMatrix<T>,Field<T>[],T>
public class CsrFieldMatrix<T extends Field<T>> extends CsrFieldMatrixBase<CsrFieldMatrix<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,CooFieldVector<T>,FieldVector<T>,T>

A sparse matrix stored in compressed sparse row (CSR) format. The AbstractTensor.entries of this CSR matrix are elements of a Field.

The non-zero entries and non-zero indices of a CSR matrix are mutable but the AbstractTensor.shape and total number of non-zero entries is fixed.

Sparse matrices allow for the efficient storage of and operations on matrices that contain many zero values.

A sparse CSR matrix is stored as:

  • The full shape of the matrix.
  • The non-zero AbstractTensor.entries of the matrix. All other entries in the matrix are assumed to be zero. Zero values can also explicitly be stored in AbstractTensor.entries.
  • The row pointers of the non-zero values in the CSR matrix. Has size numRows + 1

    • rowPointers[i] indicates the starting index within entries and colIndices of all values in row i.

  • The column indices of the non-zero values in the sparse matrix.

Note: many operations assume that the entries of the CSR matrix are sorted lexicographically by the row and column indices. (i.e.) by row indices first then column indices. However, this is not explicitly verified. Any operations implemented in this class will preserve the lexicographical sorting.

If indices need to be sorted explicitly, call CsrFieldMatrixBase.sortIndices().

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • CsrFieldMatrix

      public CsrFieldMatrix(Shape shape, Field<T>[] entries, int[] rowPointers, int[] colIndices)
      Creates a sparse CSR matrix with the specified shape, non-zero entries, row pointers, and non-zero column indices.
      Parameters:
      shape - Shape of this tensor.
      entries - The non-zero entries of this CSR matrix.
      rowPointers - The row pointers for the non-zero values in the sparse CSR matrix.

      rowPointers[i] indicates the starting index within entries and colIndices of all values in row i.

      colIndices - Column indices for each non-zero value in this sparse CSR matrix. Must satisfy entries.length == colIndices.length.

    • getRow

      public CooFieldVector<T> getRow(int rowIdx, int colStart, int colEnd)
      Gets a specified row of this matrix between colStart (inclusive) and colEnd (exclusive).
      Parameters:
      rowIdx - Index of the row of this matrix to get.
      colStart - Starting column of the row (inclusive).
      colEnd - Ending column of the row (exclusive).
      Returns:
      The row at index rowIdx of this matrix between the colStart and colEnd indices.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If either colEnd are colStart out of bounds for the shape of this matrix.
      IllegalArgumentException - If colEnd is less than colStart.
